headline: FIS (FIS): $497 Million One-Off Loss Undermines Margin Narrative Despite Strong Long-Term Growth Outlook
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) posted a net profit margin of 1.5%, down from 5.5% a year ago, after absorbing a major one-off loss totaling $497 million over the last twelve months. Despite the hit to recent results, FIS delivered a robust 23.7% compound annual earnings growth rate over the past five years and is now forecast to grow earnings by an impressive 31.5% per year, easily outpacing the broader US market's expectation of 16%. Today's share price stands at $64.75,...
